original_text: Remember that they are your special people who belong to you. You brought them out of Egypt where they were like prisoners in a very hot oven.
korean_text: 그들은 주께서 철 풀무 같은 애굽에서 인도하여 내신 주의 백성, 주의 소유가 됨이니이다

sentences.original_text: Remember that they are your special people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 당신의 특별한 백성이라는 것을 기억하십시오

sentences.original_text: You brought them out of Egypt
